content.text:
# Draft:WET Awards 2002

| next     = 3rd
}}
The 2nd WET Awards took place at the Kodak Theatre in Los Angeles, California on June 25, 2002. The awards recognized Americans in music, acting, sports, and other fields of entertainment over the past year. Professional wrestling Vince McMahon and Shane McMahon hosted the event for the second time.
